overview: Could not find a full copy of Schist so I uploaded this, an extended and manipulated version to celebrate the beginning of a 2023 full of holes and gaps. I put this copy through the optical printer and then insert bits and pieces of film and detritus in front of the camera on the run to add another layer of material, cut up slides, letraset, plastic etc, additional activity to the moving image.
title: Schists 2023
